entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
